results.purpose: Tracks marketing voucher codes and promotional offers for Good Chop customers, including free product redemptions and customer ID mappings
key_data_points: 14 different voucher types (BCN, BFY, WNG, WFY, GFY, GFL, SFY, RFY, RFL, RGY, MFY, MFL, NFY, NFL, CFY)
Voucher durations: 'For Life' and 'For Year' promotions
Multiple promo code campaigns: ORGANIC TURKEY, TURKEY ACTIVATION NAE, TURKEY REACTIVATION NAE, TURKEY CODE 2023
Turkey-related promo codes: TRK, TRKXA1A, TRKXA1B, TRKXA2A, TRKXA2B, TRKXA3A, TRKXA3B, TRKXA4A, TRKXA4B, TRKXA5A
Additional codes: GBL, TAH, THX, WHB, MAS
Over 100 unique customer IDs listed in rightmost columns

entities.name: Good Chop
entities.context: Meat and seafood subscription service offering promotional vouchers for free products

entities.name: ODL
entities.context: Referenced as source system for customer ID data ('ODL > ADD CUSTOMER ID')

insights: Premium products (Ribeyes, Filet Mignon, NY Strip) offered as both lifetime and yearly promotions, indicating high-value customer acquisition strategy
Turkey promotions appear to be a major campaign with multiple activation/reactivation codes and significant customer ID tracking
Bacon and Chicken Wings are the most accessible entry products with 'For Life' options
Email banner activation tracked for most vouchers (TRUE/FALSE flags), suggesting automated marketing communications
SKU index 60 and 145 are most common across turkey-related promotions
Ground Beef (80/20) and Wild-Caught Alaskan Sockeye Salmon included in mid-tier offerings
100% Grass Fed Ribeyes (RGY) positioned as premium differentiated product
Cheesecake (CFY) is the only non-protein item, using triple SKU (136 136 136)
Large volume of customer IDs (100+) suggests active campaign tracking or batch processing
Standardized messaging format: 'We've added your FREE [product]. Enjoy!'
